washing-team.title: Washing Team
washing-team.subtitle: The Washing Team maintains 3 washing machines and 2 dryers located in the middle basement. Every tenant may wash and dry there as long as they enter into the list. Further information is available on site.

content.text2: Please mind the sales times! No coins will be sold outside these sales times.
content.text3: Feel free to contact the Washing Team spokesperson in case of any problems.
